--- select_tablesample_with_table.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.TableName{
            Table: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    26,
            Method: "BERNOULLI",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   48,
              end:   60,
              Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
                pos:   49,
                end:   51,
                Base:  10,
                Value: "90",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(90 PERCENT)
